description: Support to Legal Aid and Disputes Settlement in Family Courts

subproject.description:
The Ministry of Justice and UNDP jointly agreed to extend the project for two years with a view to achieve the following activities:
1. Up-scaling the implementation of Legal Aid Offices and upgrading of Dispute Settlement Offices in at least three additional Family Courts
2. Enhanced institutional capacity of Family Courts
3. Enhanced Access to justice through ICT
4. Identification of international and comparative experiences to enhance the performance of family courts
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
